nodes.text: Imhar Canyon was a location on Ossus. According to the Qel-Droma Epics, it housed a Jedi temple run by the Jedi Master Anstak, situated in a submerged tunnel system, where Anstak trained Padawans from amphibious species. Supposedly, after Ossus was devastated by the Cron Supernova, some believed that Anstak and his students could have survived within the deep caverns.
